errors.cant_archive_general: You cannot archive the general channel
errors.cant_archive_required: You cannot archive a required channel
errors.method_not_supported_for_channel_type: This type of conversation cannot be used with this method.
errors.missing_scope: The calling token is not granted the necessary scopes to complete this operation.
errors.not_in_channel: The token can not be found in channel.
errors.restricted_action: A team preference prevents the authenticated user from archiving.
